page.title: 17Pastimes and hobbies
page.content: We asked all the children in our class what they did in their spare time.The most popular pastime is watching television! Most of the boys go fishing in the sea for fish, crabs and lobster.We all like going swimming in the sea in the summer. One girl usually starts swimming in July when it is warm enough for her but not for the jellyfish.Lots of the children come up and play in the village in the summer evenings.Lots of the boys play sport.Two boys go fresh water fishing. We all read books and comics like Beano and Wizzer.Some of the other pastimes are stamp collecting,making models,going shopping,playing on the computer,helping at home, drawing, riding bikes or horses, playing the guitar.
